director.name: 克劳斯·怀博尼 Klaus Wyborny

this_title: Another World (Song of the Earth Part 2)
introduction: The second of five parts of Klaus Wyborny’s “Lieder der Erde” / “Song of the Earth” cycle of films, whose theme is “the emergence of modern European civilization.” The series comprises five large parts, which are in turn divided into various selections or short films.
chinese_title: Another World (Song of the Earth Part 2)
